articles.author: James Vukmirovic
articles.title: Nine cinemas in the West Midlands get Government funding boost - expressandstar.com
articles.description: Independent cinemas in the West Midlands have been given a funding boost through a Government grant award.
articles.content:
More than 200 independent cinemas in the country have been given a share of £16 million in grants from the Governments £1.57 billion Culture Recovery Fund.
Nine cinemas in the region have been award… [+2605 chars]
